availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Anna Woods Stephens in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on November 19, 1851. Father of Kate Stephens, Martha Stephens, Sarah Stephens, Isabella Stephens, Edward Stephens, Mary E. Stephens, Alice J. Stephens, James W. Stephens, and Alex H. Stephens. Carpenter in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 207.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 5. p. 558A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 000482707, p. 118.
